title: Abbreviate Authors — abbreviate_authors
text: function abbreviates author names given data frame works. output list author names format "First Author et al. (Year)" "Author1 & Author2 (Year)".

title: Abbreviate Authors — abbreviate_authors
text: oa_works_df data frame containing works. columns 'publication_year' 'author'. 'author' data frame column 'au_display_name'. One example data frame `openalexR`.

title: Abbreviate Authors — abbreviate_authors
text: vector abbreviated author names publication years.

title: Get Count — get_count
text: function takes search term list DOIs, returns count search term DOI. duplicate DOIs provided, function stop throw error.

title: Get Count — get_count
text: search_term term search . dois list DOIs search within. Default NULL.

title: Get Count — get_count
text: named list names DOIs values counts search term DOI.

title: Plot Snowball — plot_snowball
text: function takes snowball object name, creates two plots: one sized cited_by_count cited_by_count_by_year. plots saved PDF PNG specified path.

title: Plot Snowball — plot_snowball
text: snowball snowball object containing data plotted. name name used plot titles file names. path path plot files saved. Default "figures".

title: Plot Snowball — plot_snowball
text: return value, called side effects.
